title: DiffuSETS: 12-lead ECG Generation Conditioned on Clinical Text Reports and Patient-Specific Information
details: Y Lai, J Chen, D Zhang, Y Wang, S Geng, H Li, S Hong - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Heart disease remains a significant threat to human health. As a non-invasive diagnostic tool, the electrocardiogram (ECG) is one of the most widely used methods for cardiac screening. However, the scarcity of high-quality ECG data, driven by …
